data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during El Septentrión cruise from Montevideo to Santa Catalina started at 1777-09-07
Ship: El Septentrión (Navío), Voyage: Montevideo - Santa Catalina(Brasil), 1st Observer: Antonio Osorno (Capitan)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
